hints.description: Template files are in _templates/ and include training-log-template.md, position-template.md, technique-template.md, and competition-template.md
hints.context: When asked to modify or create templates

hints.description: BJJ notes are organized in folders: training-logs/, positions/, techniques/, competition/, resources/, and canvas/
hints.context: When asked about note organization or where to save files

hints.description: Training logs use YYYY-MM-DD-training.md format and include class type, instructor, and rolling partner details
hints.context: When discussing training logs or daily entries

hints.description: The dashboard.md file contains dataview queries for recent notes, tag overview, and quick stats
hints.context: When asked about statistics or overview of the vault

hints.description: Position relationships are mapped in canvas files: main-positions.canvas, half-guard-system.canvas, and others
hints.context: When discussing technique relationships or system visualization

hints.description: Templater is used for date automation, file naming, and interactive prompts like class type selection and partner details
hints.context: When working with templates or automation

hints.description: Uses structured tagging for positions (#position, #guard, etc), training types (#gi, #nogi), and progress tracking (#need-work, #solid)
hints.context: When discussing organization or searching notes

hints.description: Position notes include review tracking with dates and history, updated via template button
hints.context: When discussing position study or review process
